column5: Is anyone use the ice or snow build the real small ice house for 3-5 people? It will save you to bring and remove off the season. Just Leave it there and it will melt itself. I will made one next year and to see how it work Any input please!
I have no experience building but I have seen them built by others.  You need snow deep enough to saw chunks out off, seem like a lot of work to me.
Loon lodge on Temagami usually builds and ice house every year. Just be certain to mark it really well... as I'd hate for someone to hit it in low light levels/haze/white out.
Many videos abound on the internet
if you are serious = then check this out !!!!!  http://www.eskimold.com/  ROOK
